system.description: Effect: The user places 5 floating rock mine Hazards within Range. When a creature moves within 2m of a rock mine, it homes in on them and deals a Tick of Rock-Type damage.

actions.name: Stealth Rock
actions.description: Effect: The user places 5 floating rock mine Hazards within Range. When a creature moves within 2m of a rock mine, it homes in on them and deals a Tick of Rock-Type damage.
